item.title: Microsoft and NASA Use It? My 4-Year-Old Side Project Hit 100 Stars
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: cpp-linter-action is a GitHub Action that provides C/C++ code formatting and static analysis capabilities. It uses clang-format and clang-tidy, supporting various configurations and custom rules. Since its creation in 2021, the project has been used by several well-known organizations and open-source projects.
